lotharayi polata polisiya paninne nathi nisa prajashalawa piti passe kata polak saha hed polak thibuna..ethanin dinapu samaharu goda wadikara gannata ethana eha paththe thibunu kos mandiye buru polata giya..samaharu goda giya thawath aya nathi wuna ..ookata polisiyeno panapu welawata ara okkoma lotharayi pola langaya ..anthimata lotharayi pole mulu gamema aya innawa ..ohoma kattiya wadi wunothya ara serawama pannala danawa gewal walata ..passe kaleka lotharayi polath awurudu dawas dekata witharak thiyanna kiyala buru gaminita polisiyen kiwwa .oya sudu piti okkoma kale buru gaminiya ..buru gamini kiyanne mala gewal wal hoyagena gihin sudu gahana kenek..samaharu kiyanne gaminita munu hayak thiyana katharagama deyiyo buru gahanna giyama aruda wenawaya kiyala ..kochchara mala gewal wala buru gahuwath awurudu dawas wala buru gahuwe natha..anthimata aduma goda 2,5,10 wuna ..buru gaminita buru polakadi pihiyen anala marunama lotharayi pola nathiwa giya ..eth kata polayo hed ekayi ,buru pitiyayi thawama thiyenawa ..
